column1: UNINTENDED EQUIPMENT OPERATION•Perform a hazard and risk analysis to determine the appropriate safetyintegrity level, and any other safety requirements, for your specificapplication based on all the applicable standards.•Ensure that the hazard and risk analysis is conducted and respectedaccording to EN/ISO 12100 during the design of your machine.Failure to follow these instructions can result in death, serious injury, orequipment damage.
